description: Analyzes and accumulates test report values for the specified test reports.

parameters.name: reportGroupArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the report group that contains the reports to analyze.

parameters.name: numOfReports
parameters.description: The number of reports to analyze. This operation always retrieves the most recent reports. If this parameter is omitted, the most recent 100 reports are analyzed.

parameters.name: trendField
parameters.description: The test report value to accumulate. This must be one of the following values: Test reports:   DURATION Accumulate the test run times for the specified reports. PASS_RATE Accumulate the percentage of tests that passed for the specified test reports. TOTAL Accumulate the total number of tests for the specified test reports. Code coverage reports:   BRANCH_COVERAGE Accumulate the branch coverage percentages for the specified test reports. BRANCHES_COVERED Accumulate the branches covered values for the specified test reports. BRANCHES_MISSED Accumulate the branches missed values for the specified test reports. LINE_COVERAGE Accumulate the line coverage percentages for the specified test reports. LINES_COVERED Accumulate the lines covered values for the specified test reports. LINES_MISSED Accumulate the lines not covered values for the specified test reports.

nested_items.name: average
nested_items.description: Contains the average of all values analyzed.

nested_items.name: rawData
nested_items.description: An array that contains the raw data for each report.

nested_items.name: data
nested_items.description: The value of the requested data field from the report.
